String.string: All in the Name of Science
See if you can assist Surdan.
Go see {@LinkCreature:245#3510#Surdan} at {@Rgn:45007$$Field Base Tenacity} in {@Rgn:45001$$Thrallhold}.
Kill {@LinkCreature:45#2002#argonomorph horntoads} near the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper} and collect their ichor.
Deliver the ichor to {@LinkCreature:245#3510#Surdan} at {@Rgn:45007$$Field Base Tenacity}.
Kill {@LinkCreature:45#2001#argonomorph blood fiends} around the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper} and collect their blood.
Deliver the blood samples to {@LinkCreature:245#3510#Surdan} at {@Rgn:45007$$Field Base Tenacity}.
Collect samples of duckweed growing in the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper}.
Deliver the duckweed to {@LinkCreature:245#3510#Surdan} at {@Rgn:45007$$Field Base Tenacity}.
